CardNode.Name: Goblin Scourge 1:Raiding Party
CardNode.Description: Your peaceful farm life is shattered by the chittering cries of goblins smashing their way into your house.

CardNode.Name: Goblin Scourge 2:Village Rescue
CardNode.Description: You arrive at the village only to find it in flames. Quick, rescue anyone you can!

CardNode.Name: Goblin Scourge 3:Goblin Shaman
CardNode.Description: At the center of the village stands a savage goblin shaman, the small beast directing the goblin hoard. Take your revenge on him.

CardNode.Name: Goblin Scourge 4:Tracking
CardNode.Description: The goblins have fled, leaving the village in ruins. You decide to track them back to their lair.

CardNode.Name: Goblin Scourge 5:Payback
CardNode.Description: You see the goblins have erected a small town of tents in the cavern. It would be a shame if someone destroyed it all.
